title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\WindowsUpdateSettings
name: WindowsUpdateSettings
description:
Windows patching is performed using the Windows Update Agent.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.WindowsUpdateSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.classifications
params.description: Only apply updates of these windows update classifications. If empty, all updates are applied.

params.name: data.excludes
params.description: List of KBs to exclude from update.

params.name: data.exclusive_patches
params.description: An exclusive list of kbs to be updated. These are the only patches that will be updated. This field must not be used with other patch configurations.
